name: The Block Pro
title: Virtuals Tokenizing Monetizable Autonomous Ai
text:
Synopsis
Virtuals Protocol introduces a groundbreaking platform for tokenizing AI agents as autonomous, revenue-generating assets that can be invested in and co-owned by users.

Key Insights
- Virtuals Protocol offers a "plug-and-play" solution for developers to integrate AI agents into applications
- Ethereum's Dencun upgrade in March 2024 implemented proto-danksharding (EIP-4844), creating a separate fee market for "blobspace"
- Layer 2 networks experienced a total value locked (TVL) drop of 8.2% in December 2024, totaling over $4 billion
- Crypto markets reacted negatively to the U.S. Fed's indication of fewer rate cuts expected in 2025
- The crypto market experienced a pullback towards the end of December 2024, influenced by declining crypto prices
